pr_title: Make store dir relative to build dir when saving OpenAPI schema

timeline.message:
Make store dir relative to build dir when saving OpenAPI schema

Signed-off-by: Phillip Kruger <phillip.kruger@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: I don't understand why you need to define that one? Wouldn't it be the default now?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Hi @gsmet - default is not storing the document at all, like it is currently.
replies.author: phillip-kruger
